challengeDetails.cozmoNotOnTreads.descri.translation: Please help Cozmo get upright and ready to play.

challengeDetails.cozmoDizzy.description.translation: Wait until Cozmo has recovered from being Dizzy and is ready to play.

challengeDetails.cozmoIsStillWakingUpMod.translation: Please wait for Cozmo to wake up and drive off of his charger.

challengeDetails.cozmoHasHiccups.descrip.translation: Try to help Cozmo by putting him upside-down.

cubeSlap.description.translation: Tempt Cozmo to pounce on a Cube, then pull it away before he can!

droneMode.description.translation: Explore the world through Cozmo's eyes!

faceEnrollment.description.translation: Help Cozmo recognize people and learn their name.

memoryMatchGame.description.translation: A pattern game that tests your memory. Watch the Cubes and listen carefully!

speedTap.description.translation: A color matching game of fast reflexes and sharp wits.

cozmoSays.description.translation: In exchange for Sparks, Cozmo will try to say a word or phrase!

codeLab.description.translation: Use your creativity to program Cozmo and explore things you can do together!
